title: >>> Welcome to SEASON 6!
body_text:
Just days removed from literally and figuratively the biggest dodgeball event in history ...
______________________________________
One can almost
expect the unexpected
in Season 6 with surprises, shocks, twists and more, especially at the OYA. DODGEBALL 50 certainly set new standards and added more fun to an already incredible journey.
Kevin Adams: The Reign Continues!
Already, Season 6 will kick off with a bang as reigning singles champ Kevin Adams will defend the coveted Captains Championship. Having won the title from Sara DeCuir at DODGEBALL 48, he then went on to defeat another legend in John Tronolone to retain at DODGEBALL 49. From there at DODGEBALL 50, he was one of four players, oddly enough with all three of his brothers, in the first-ever "2 vs. 2" captains battle, in which he and iconic brother Steve came out victorious.
So after three incredible victories for the young, crafty veteran, his next challenger has yet to be decided. Of course that will change come August the 12th: the second elimination-style Rimshot Contest will take place! All hopefuls be prepared; the winner could be you!
Also, DODGEBALL 51 is the official debut of stables! Who will unite?!
Quick Schedule
DODGEBALL 51: Saturday, August 12th, 2006 at WHS (6:30pm)
DODGEBALL 52: Saturday, August 19th, 2006 at WHS (6:30pm)
DODGEBALL 53: Saturday, August 26th, 2006 at WHS (6:30pm)
DODGEBALL 54: Sunday, September 3rd, 2006 at ORP (TBD)
DODGEBALL 55: Saturday, September 9th, 2006 at WHS (6:30pm)
DODGEBALL 54 / The OYA
If you haven't figured it out yet, then perhaps time has passed you by.
DODGEBALL 54, also known as the "OYA" (or the One Year Anniversary) will undeniably be the biggest non-"ten" event ever. Expect the pageantry, the music, and hell, maybe even some surprises when Ocean Road Park hosts THE one year anniversary of dodgeball. This almost unimagined event will take place on the eve of Labor Day; Sunday, September 3rd.
And although it is still four weeks away, DODGEBALL 54 / The OYA will consist of nothing but painballs and foam footballs!
